  "title": "Bug 137464: Data preview not refreshing after applying a filter in chart editor's select data page",
  "description": "",
  "OB": "",
  "EB": "After applying a filter, the data preview in the chart editor's select data page does not refresh.",
  "SR": "Description: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview part is not refreshed. \n
        Steps to Reproduce: \n
        1. Open the attached file. \n
        2. Create a chart and choose the select data page. \n
        3. Use the Join dataset and set the X Y series."
}

origin.input_prompt:

It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
